channel.title: Kreedomscape ~ new rsps ~ - Need Staff - 07 oldschool
channel.description:
Hello there Kreedomscape is a brand new RSPS, put online Today!!!. We're a friendly community who is looking for new staff and players, We're not like other servers, everyone in our community will treat you with respect, and we dont have the over used edgeville home, but we added a twist and made it in Lumbridge It's good, trust me!
Kreedomscape Is an olschool server based on the 2007 era. Owner- Mod Raven Co-Owner Mod Krow Admins - None! Moderators - None!
Here are some of the features we have in our server, not all, but some... Dueling God wars dungeon (FULLY working, kill counts needed [old rs gwd] ) Many different shops at home Fully working lootshare (clan chat) Bosses! KBD Daggonoth kings chaos elemental More coming soon...
Basic essentials available in shops 24/7 hosted Fully working barrows Pest control Tzhaar caves Fully working PK'ing Easy to switch prayers, Altars at edge! Owner and co-owner on alot so you can easily get help AND MUCH MUCH MORE!
Unfortuantley, I cannot upload pics due to problems with my PC, but the link to the webclient and downloadable client is https://www.rspscoding.org/play/?server=KreedomScape If you're webclient isn't working, follow these steps. 1) Control panel 2) Search Java 3) Press Java 4) Security 5) Edit site list 6) Add these three sites to your list https://www.rspscoding.org/play/?server=KreedomScape
Thanks, Kreedom Team.

item.title: Kreedomscape ~ new rsps ~ - Need Staff - 07 oldschool
item.dc:creator: @Im_Gaara Im Gaara
item.description:
@Im_Gaara wrote:

no download link here, just webclient, could you possibly make a downloadable client?

Read full topic
item.source: Kreedomscape ~ new rsps ~ - Need Staff - 07 oldschool

item.title: Kreedomscape ~ new rsps ~ - Need Staff - 07 oldschool
item.dc:creator: @troyw2000 troyw2000
item.description:
@troyw2000 wrote:

Hello there
Kreedomscape is a brand new RSPS, put online Today!!!. We’re a friendly community who is looking for new staff and players, We’re not like other servers, everyone in our community will treat you with respect, and we dont have the over used edgeville home, but we added a twist and made it in Lumbridge It’s good, trust me!

Kreedomscape Is an olschool server based on the 2007 era.
Owner- Mod Raven
Co-Owner Mod Krow
Admins - None!
Moderators - None!

Here are some of the features we have in our server, not all, but some…
Dueling
God wars dungeon (FULLY working, kill counts needed [old rs gwd] )
Many different shops at home
Fully working lootshare (clan chat)
Bosses!
KBD
Daggonoth kings
chaos elemental
More coming soon…

Basic essentials available in shops
24/7 hosted
Fully working barrows
Pest control
Tzhaar caves
Fully working PK’ing
Easy to switch prayers, Altars at edge!
Owner and co-owner on alot so you can easily get help
AND MUCH MUCH MORE!

Unfortuantley, I cannot upload pics due to problems with my PC, but the link to the webclient and downloadable client is https://www.rspscoding.org/play/?server=KreedomScape
If you’re webclient isn’t working, follow these steps.

  1. Control panel
  2. Search Java
  3. Press Java
  4. Security
  5. Edit site list
  6. Add these three sites to your list
    https://www.rspscoding.org/play/?server=KreedomScape

Thanks,
Kreedom Team.

Read full topic
